remarks: Condition for a functor to also be a functor into the restriction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
funcres2b.a $e |- A = ( Base ` C ) $.
funcres2b.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
funcres2b.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( Subcat ` D ) ) $.
funcres2b.s $e |- ( ph -> R Fn ( S X. S ) ) $.
funcres2b.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
funcres2b.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. A ) ) -> ( x G y ) : Y --> ( ( F ` x ) R ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
funcres2b $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( C Func D ) G <-> F ( C Func ( D |`cat R ) ) G ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d ph x y $.
